00041 void Timer::reset() {
00042         startTimeStamp = getCurrentTime();
00043 }
00044 long double Timer::getElapsedTime() {
00045         currentTimeStamp = getCurrentTime();
00046         return currentTimeStamp - startTimeStamp;
00047 }
00048 long double Timer::getCurrentTime() {
00049 #ifdef WIN32
00050 //      LARGE_INTEGER tick;
00051 //      QueryPerformanceCounter(&tick);
00052 //      tick.QuadPart = tick.QuadPart * 1.0e3 / winTicksPerSecond;
00053 //      return tick.u.LowPart;
00054         // TODO implement me
00055         return -1.0;
00056 #else
00057         struct timeval thisTime;
00058         gettimeofday(&thisTime, 0);
00059         return static_cast<long double>( thisTime.tv_sec * 1.0e3 + thisTime.tv_usec * 1.0e-3);
00060 #endif
00061 }
